Articles.Content:
I'm looking for anyone who has experience with mods. I, myself, do and am looking for others to do work on a big mod with. No other details for now. Email me with any questions. Natedog.spalding[at]gmail.com

Edited June 2, 2013 by Rich

I'm no expert, but, you've given no information on your idea, so, I would guess that experienced modders (who have enough on their plates most likely), will look at this and think... "nah".

So not only are you hiding from Jedi, you're hiding from modders also.

Just a thought! Good luck though
